attributes.long-description:
Take Joe Danger on a death-defying thrill ride across the set of the greatest blockbuster movie ever made. Chase crooks on your police bike, destroy laser firing robots with a stolen jetpack, escape giant boulders in a minecart, time-travel to punch dinosaurs and divert the nuclear missiles on your unicycle! Featuring unique vehicles like snowmobiles, jetpacks, unicycles, skis and motorbikes! Every time you play, your ghost is uploaded to the cloud! Race against rivals or become famous as the world number one. Use tricks and combos to rule the leaderboards. Create your own blockbuster in the Movie Maker!

Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV

1 player(s)
Network Features
16384KB Minimum
Touchscreen

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.
